content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Dear Maryam, thank you for your interest in our apartment in Magdeburg. Let's begin our negotiation focusing solely on the rental price at this moment. I have high expectations for this property, so please consider my opening offer of 1400 Euros per month. If you find this acceptable, kindly respond with 'I agree to the price of [1400] Euro!' If not, let me know your proposed amount, and we can continue discussing further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because starting with such a high price may not allow for a fair discussion. Let's try finding a more reasonable starting point to reach an agreement.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Understood, Maryam. In light of your concerns, I'll adjust my stance. Let's resume our negotiation with the rental price at 1350 Euros per month as my new opening offer. If this price is more suitable for discussion, please state 'I agree to the price of [1350] Euro!' or propose an alternate figure if needed. If we cannot find common ground, we'll terminate the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 1350 Euro!
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
